purpose: Provide a collection of AI assistants for various tasks using Azure and OpenAI technologies
principle: Leverages OpenAI's language models and Azure services to create customizable AI assistants for different applications
reusability: Modular design allows for easy customization and integration with different Azure services and APIs
limitations: Limited to users with Azure and OpenAI API access, currently in early development stages
name: aitour-azure-openai-assistants
